tool.name: MeasureObjectIntensity

configfiles.configfile:
import json import sys import os
FOURSPACES=" " NEWLINE="\n"
input_json_path = sys.argv[1] input_pipeline= sys.argv[2]
params = json.load(open(input_json_path, "r"))
def writemoi(): f.write(NEWLINE)
f.write("MeasureObjectIntensity:[module_num:"+str(new_count)+"|svn_version:\\'Unknown\\'|variable_revision_number:3|show_window:False|notes:\\x5B\\x5D|batch_state:array(\\x5B\\x5D, dtype=uint8)|enabled:True|wants_pause:False]"+NEWLINE)
hidden = str(len(params['rpt_image']))
f.write(FOURSPACES+"Hidden:" + hidden+NEWLINE)
for img in params['rpt_image']: f.write(FOURSPACES+"Select an image to measure:"+img['image_to_measure']+NEWLINE)
for obj in params['rpt_object']: f.write(FOURSPACES+"Select objects to measure:"+obj['objects_to_measure']+NEWLINE)
with open(input_pipeline) as fin: lines = fin.readlines()
k,v= lines[4].strip().split(':')
module_count = int(v) new_count = module_count+1 lines[4]= k+":"+str(new_count)+"\n" with open("output","w") as f: f.writelines(lines) writemoi()
f.close()

tool.help:
This tool append the MeasureObjectIntensity module section to an existing pipeline file (.cppipe).
Input: existing pipeline file
Output: new pipeline file
Combine this tool with "Common" and "CellProfiler" together to run the module alone.
